TextBlock.Text: TROV: Oh wow... This tower is huge!
IRNA: No kidding. Say, we really gotta thank the others for saving us from the water planet.
TROV: Yeah... Speaking of water planet, there it is now!
IRNA: <color=red>(sarcasm)</color> Oh, wow. I can see it so clearly.
TROV: Oh, right. Your vision. Nearsighted.
TROV: Aha, so, don't we a have a project to work on?
